column7: In this seminar, first-year students in the DGS Enrichment Experience Program will learn to develop their strengths, interests, and transferable skills while investigating current and evolving societal challenges. Through class discussion, readings, and a semester-long project, students will explore a variety of topics, including leadership, creativity, research and service. Students will also learn how to craft their own college experience by understanding the many opportunities available at Illinois. Prerequisite: Restricted to first-year students in the DGS Enrichment Experience Program with an 1DEE attribute.
column9: Prerequisite: Restricted to first-year students in the DGS Enrichment Experience Program with an 1DEE attribute.
